author: jane.smith@company.com
content: I've reproduced this issue on Safari 15.4. It seems to be related to third-party cookies being blocked. @john.doe@company.com can you test with cookies enabled?

author: john.doe@company.com
content: Good catch! I confirmed that enabling cookies resolves the issue. We should add better error messaging for users with strict cookie settings.

author: diana.prince@company.com
content: I've completed the database optimization analysis. The main bottleneck is the user_activities table join. Proposing to add composite index on (user_id, created_at).

author: charlie.brown@company.com
content: @diana.prince@company.com Excellent analysis! Please proceed with the index creation. Also consider partitioning the table by month if the dataset continues to grow.

author: henry.garcia@company.com
content: Investigating the 500 errors. Initial analysis shows memory exhaustion when processing large datasets. Working on implementing pagination for the reports endpoint.
